text: She is projected to be a billionaire in just a few years. But it's the precious moments with her daughter that seem to matter the most to Kylie Jenner. The 21 - year - old make - up mogul took to her official YouTube channel to post a video documenting her routine before one of boyfriend Travis Scott's Astroworld Tour concerts at legendary Madison Square Garden in New York City.
